info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell County through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blowing Rock, or over Blowing Rock In Caldwell County. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Upton, Globe and Patterson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
